subject: Question about basic VAM
description_text:
Hello!

I ordered the VAM Pro for my brake and I'm debating on purchasing the
rotary VAM. Before I order, I was wondering if there's brackets and screws
provided for just a single VAM. I already bought a power supply for the VAM
Pro so I only need the rotary vam for my throttle.

Thank you so much.
Take care,
Ryan Lin
